snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been charged with misconduct for comments made to the referee during last weekend's Premier League match against Burnley, the FA said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Mourinho Hit With Second Misconduct Charge
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Hit With Second Misconduct Charge

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been charged with misconduct for comments made to the referee during last weekend's Premier League match against Burnley, the FA said on Tuesday.

snippet: Aston Villa have signed Australia midfielder Mile Jedinak from Crystal Palace on a three-year contract, the Championship side confirmed on Wednesday....

headline.main: Australia's Jedinak Joins Aston Villa From Crystal Palace
headline.print_headline: Australia's Jedinak Joins Aston Villa From Crystal Palace

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have signed Australia midfielder Mile Jedinak from Crystal Palace on a three-year contract, the Championship side confirmed on Wednesday.

snippet: Chelsea is buying its way out of a sponsorship with sportswear giant Adidas six years early to sign up with a rival jersey maker....

headline.main: Chelsea Buys Out Adidas Deal 6 Yrs Early to Sign With Rival
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Buys Out Adidas Deal 6 Yrs Early to Sign With Rival

lead_paragraph: Chelsea is buying its way out of a sponsorship with sportswear giant Adidas six years early to sign up with a rival jersey maker.

snippet: Midfielder Dele Alli has signed a new deal with Tottenham Hotspur which will keep him at the north London club till 2022, the Premier League side said on Monday....

headline.main: Midfielder Alli Extends Contract With Spurs to 2022
headline.print_headline: Midfielder Alli Extends Contract With Spurs to 2022

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Dele Alli has signed a new deal with Tottenham Hotspur which will keep him at the north London club till 2022, the Premier League side said on Monday.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho urged Anthony Martial to resist the temptation to move away from Old Trafford after the Frenchman produced his best performance under the Portuguese coach in Saturday's stirring 2-1 win over Middlesbrough....

headline.main: 'Listen to Me, Not Your Agent,' Mourinho Tells Sparkling Martial
headline.print_headline: 'Listen to Me, Not Your Agent,' Mourinho Tells Sparkling Martial

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho urged Anthony Martial to resist the temptation to move away from Old Trafford after the Frenchman produced his best performance under the Portuguese coach in Saturday's stirring 2-1 win over Middlesbrough.

snippet: Manchester United defender Marcos Rojo suffered an injury in training on Saturday and was doubtful for Saturday's FA Cup final, the club said....

headline.main: United's Rojo a Doubt for FA Cup Final
headline.print_headline: United's Rojo a Doubt for FA Cup Final

lead_paragraph: Manchester United defender Marcos Rojo suffered an injury in training on Saturday and was doubtful for Saturday's FA Cup final, the club said.

snippet: Newcastle United have reached an agreement for the transfer of Swansea City midfielder Jonjo Shelvey for a fee of 12 million pounds ($17.4 million), the BBC reported on Tuesday....

headline.main: Newcastle Agree 12 Million-Pound Fee for Swansea's Shelvey-BBC
headline.print_headline: Newcastle Agree 12 Million-Pound Fee for Swansea's Shelvey-BBC

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have reached an agreement for the transfer of Swansea City midfielder Jonjo Shelvey for a fee of 12 million pounds ($17.4 million), the BBC reported on Tuesday.

snippet: Diego Costa struck late to give Chelsea a 1-0 victory over West Brom on Sunday and extend its winning run to nine Premier League games....

headline.main: Costa Strikes Late to Give Chelsea Victory Over West Brom
headline.print_headline: Costa Strikes Late to Give Chelsea Victory Over West Brom

lead_paragraph: Diego Costa struck late to give Chelsea a 1-0 victory over West Brom on Sunday and extend its winning run to nine Premier League games.

snippet: Chelsea have signed Belgian forward Michy Batshuayi from Olympique Marseille on a five-year contract, the Premier League club said on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Chelsea have signed Belgian forward Michy Batshuayi from Olympique Marseille on a five-year contract, the Premier League club said on Sunday.

snippet: Defender Martin Demichelis has left Manchester City at the end of his contract, the Premier League club said in a statement on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Defender Martin Demichelis has left Manchester City at the end of his contract, the Premier League club said in a statement on Friday.
